name: 莊俊融
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。1.應力、應變、能量、及失效。2.厚壁圓筒。3.圓盤對稱彎曲。4.撓曲、反力、及能量法。5.扭轉。6.非對稱彎曲、剪力中心、及薄壁梁。7.曲梁。8.塑性崩潰、及極限分析。
1. Stress, strain, energy, and failure. 2. Thick-walled cylinders. 3. Symmetric bending of circular plates.  4. Deflection, reactions, and energy methods. 5. Torsion. 6. Unsymmetric bending, shear center, and thin-walled beams. 7. Curved beams. 8. Plastic collapse and limit analysis.
schedule:
W1 Analysis of stress I
W2 Analysis of stress II
W3 Analysis of strain I
W4 Analysis of strain II
W5 Stress-strain relations for linearly elastic solids
W6 Energy methods I
W7 Energy methods II
W8 Bending of beams I
W9 Midterm exam
W10 Bending of beams II
W11 Torsion I
W12 Torson II
W13 Axisymmetric problems I
W14 Axisymmetric problems II
W15 12/31 Bridge holiday
W16 Plastic Collapse and Limit Analysis I
W17 Plastic Collapse and Limit Analysis II
W18 Final exam
materials:
Textbook:
Chun-Ying Lee, Intermediate Mechanics of Materials, Self-edited lecture notes 3rd edition

References:
S. Timoshenko, J. N. Goodier, Theory of elasticity, Mcgraw-Hill Book Company Inc
R.C. Hibbeler, Mechanics of materials, Pearson, 8th edition in SI unit
D. L. Logan, A first course in the finite element method, Thomson, 4th edition
Journal papers
